entry.title: On-going data spam
entry.summary: The context highlights the importance of consistent uptimes of nodes while bringing up a new node, especially on a low-bandwidth connection. This has always been the case. Additionally, the absence of blacklists is mentioned as NAK, and it is suggested that if someone wants to store and serve the chain irrespective of its contents without any cost, they can adopt a no blacklists policy. However, others may opt for different approaches.
